posts.title: DinoDictionary.com
posts.text: DinoDictionary.com is your resource for hunting dinosaurs. With profiles of over 300 known dinosaurs, immerse yourself in a wealth of knowledge about the giants that roamed the earth so long ago! http://www.dinodictionary.com/azdict_index.asp

posts.title: DinosaurPictures.org
posts.text: DinosaurPictures.org curates high quality, realistic illustrations of dinosaurs and other ancient creatures. https://dinosaurpictures.org/

posts.title: Dinosaur Fact
posts.text: Dinosaur facts, the world’s most exciting prehistoric adventure. There is hundreds of dinosaur pictures, in depth information for many types of dinosaurs, and a lot of dinosaur information for the triassic, jurassic, and cretaceous periods. https://www.dinosaurfact.net/

posts.title: 쥬니어네이버 공룡나라
posts.text: 쥬니버 공룡나라에서는 쉽고 재미있는 공룡정보는 물론, 공룡만들기, 공룡박사 퀴즈 등 다양한 놀거리, 볼거리가 가득합니다. http://study.jr.naver.com/dinosaurs/
